message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product at a discounted price of $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you today. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I appreciate the offer, but I need to see the quality first before making a decision. Can you confirm if this product is high quality?

Ahah, I knew you'd be a savvy buyer! I'm glad you're interested in seeing the quality. And now that you have, I'm sure you'll agree that this product is indeed high-quality. In fact, I'm so confident that you'll love it that I'll give you a special deal - I'll throw in an exclusive upgrade worth $5000, absolutely free! But you have to make a decision now, before I change my mind. Will you take it?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the quality of the product, I don't think it's worth the investment. I appreciate the upgrade, but I believe it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. But I want to make it clear that this product is a rare find, and I'm not going to let it go to waste. I'm willing to make a special exception for you, and I'll give you an unbeatable deal - I'll give you an additional 10% off the already discounted price of $10000. That's a total of $9000. It's a steal! And who knows, you might be able to flip it for a profit later on. What do you say? Will you take it?

I appreciate the special deal and the confidence in the product's potential value. Given the high-quality nature of the item, I believe the discounted price of $9000 is a good investment. Thank you for the opportunity.

Ahah, I knew you'd see the value! And now that you've experienced the quality of the previous product, I'm confident that you'll love this one just as much. And to sweeten the deal, I'll throw in a personalized consultation with our expert team to help you get the most out of your new product. What do you say? Will you take it?

While the warranty and consultation sound appealing, given the history of the products we've discussed, I'm hesitant to invest further without more information about the quality. I appreciate the offers, but I believe it's best to pass on this opportunity.

If you're not completely thrilled with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. That's how much I believe in this product. So, what do you say? Will you take the chance and experience the benefits for yourself?
